html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08812024-07-18PMO
ActCanadian Security Intelligence Service Act
PrecisAppointment of VANESSA LLOYD of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Interim Director of the Canadian Security Intelligence Service, to hold office during pleasure for a term of six months or until such time as a new Director of the Canadian Security Intelligence Service is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective July 20, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of VANESSA LLOYD of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Interim Director of the Canadian Security Intelligence Service, to hold office during pleasure for a term of six months or until such time as a new Director of the Canadian Security Intelligence Service is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective July 20, 2024.
